name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 10+ years of experience excelling in **test automation** and driving **CI/CD** processes. Proficient in utilizing **Gitflow** for streamlined collaboration and ensuring code quality. Experienced in implementing **visual test automation** and utilizing advanced **AI test tools**. Demonstrated aptitude in **mentoring** teams to enhance skills in **automation frameworks** and effective collaboration methods.

Additionally, I bring a strong background in full stack development with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My technical proficiency extends to building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, integrating **microservices architecture**, and developing real-time analytics solutions with embedded AI/ML capabilities. With a commitment to delivering high-quality software and ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, I am passionate about creating impactful systems that meet both technical excellence and user needs.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and executed robust **test automation** strategies using **Cypress** and **Playwright**, ensuring reliable and efficient test coverage for both web and API services.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines streamlining deployment processes and enhancing code quality through automated testing and **Gitflow** practices, facilitating integration and deployment across environments.
• Mentored junior QA engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and skill advancement in **test automation** techniques and frameworks.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance collaboration on testing processes, ensuring alignment with development workflows and project timelines.
• Integrated **AI test tools** into the QA suite to improve testing efficiency and accuracy, leveraging data-driven insights for better test scenarios and coverage.
• Designed and maintained visual test automation frameworks, utilizing modern libraries to ensure that UI components perform as expected, thereby improving user experience.
• Established robust testing strategies utilizing **Cypress** for end-to-end testing and **Playwright** for cross-browser testing, gauging performance across multiple platforms.
• Contributed significantly to the testing of large-scale applications with high user traffic, measuring performance metrics and optimizing for high availability across **99.9%** SLA standards.
• Enhanced test case documentation and reporting with automated tools, achieving a **30%** reduction in manual testing time, leading to increased team efficiency.

Implemented test automation strategies using **Cypress** and **Playwright** to ensure robust testing for financial platform features, reducing manual testing efforts by **40%**.
Developed and maintained automation frameworks leveraging **Gitflow** for version control, enhancing team collaboration and integration into CI/CD pipelines, leading to a **30%** improvement in release cycle times.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **AI test tools** into the testing processes, enabling smarter testing approaches that increased defect detection rates by **25%**.
Mentored junior QA engineers in best practices for test automation, fostering a culture of continuous learning and collaboration within the team.
Designed and executed visual test automation using advanced techniques, ensuring high-quality user experiences for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Conducted performance testing for transaction systems, identifying critical bottlenecks and reducing regression test cycles by **15%**.
Leveraged automation frameworks to create end-to-end test scenarios for real-time transaction monitoring, ensuring operational reliability and enhanced user trust.

Implemented test automation frameworks using **Playwright** and **Cypress** for end-to-end testing, ensuring high-quality releases through comprehensive testing strategies across multiple modules.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **CI/CD** pipelines, enhancing deployment processes and ensuring seamless integration of automated tests into the workflow.
Mentored junior QA engineers on best practices in test automation and visual test automation techniques, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the team.
Developed and maintained AI-driven testing tools to enhance test coverage and efficiency, leveraging insights from behavioral data to optimize test scenarios and execution.
Utilized **Gitflow** for version control, ensuring a streamlined process for managing code changes and facilitating collaboration among team members on project developments.
Conducted peer reviews and collaborated with development teams to refine test cases and align on project requirements, leading to improved product quality and reduced defect rates by **30%** over **6 months**.
Implemented and monitored automation testing metrics, providing analytical insights that drove improvements in both product and testing processes, with a focus on optimizing performance outcomes and reducing manual testing efforts by **50%**.
Engaged in strategic planning sessions for test strategy that included discussions on automating regression tests for major features, resulting in reduced release cycle time by **20%**.
Coordinated with project managers to prioritize testing efforts based on risk assessment, ensuring critical features received thorough testing and validation prior to deployment.
